flawed_nl_solution:
Alix has 3 * 10 = <<3*10=30>>30 chocolates.
After his mom took 5 chocolates, Alix has now 30 - 5 = <<30-5=30>>30 chocolate.
So Alix has 30 - 10 = <<30-10=20>>20 chocolates more than Nick.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 30. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
